xule.checks.variables.description: Warn when a variable or constant is referenced, but it's not defined in the file and it's not a built-in variable.

xule.checks.functions.description: Warn when a function is invoked, but it's not defined in the file and is not a built-in function. Report an error if it's invoked with the wrong number of arguments.

xule.checks.properties.description: Warn when a property is accessed that doesn't exist. Report an error when the wrong number of arguments is given to a property.

xule.namespaces.definitions.description: Load namespace definitions from these JSON files (relative to the workspace or absolute).

xule.autoImports.description: Load XULE definitions from these files (relative to the workspace or absolute).

xule.server.debug.description: Traces the work of the language server and its communication with VS Code. Note: enabling this may dramatically slow down the extension.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd language-server/client && npm run update-vscode && cd ../.. && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack: npm run clean && webpack --mode production --config ./language-server/client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode production --config ./language-server/server/webpack.config.js
scripts.webpack:dev: npm run clean && webpack --mode none --config ./language-server/client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode none --config ./language-server/server/webpack.config.js
scripts.postinstall: cd language-server/client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && npm run antlr4ts && cd ..
